ingredients.content: 2 sprigs fresh flat-leaf parsley, leaves only
1 sprig fresh rosemary (approx. 10 cm), leaves only
½ - 1 orange, zest only, no white pith, finely grated
100 g day old bread (approx. 2-3 slices), torn into pieces (3 cm)

preparations.content: Place garlic, onion and butter into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula, then sauté <b>3 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>, placing simmering basket instead of measuring cup onto mixing bowl lid.
Add prunes, parsley, rosemary, orange zest and orange juice and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula, then cook <b>2 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.

Add all remaining stuffing ingredients and chop <b>5 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula, then repeat chopping <b>5 sec/speed 7<b>. Transfer stuffing into a bowl and set aside to cool completely before use.
